div.p: FEBRUARY, OF COURSE, IS BLACK HISTORY MONTH.
HERE TO LEND US HIS PERSPECTIVE ON THIS SPECIAL EVENT, DAILY SHOW SENIOR BLACK CORRESPONDENT LARRY WILMORE.
A YOUNG FARMER NAMED GEORGE WASHINGTON CARVER OVERCAME-- I'M SORRY, JON, I HAVE TO STOP.
I CAN'T SPEND ANOTHER FEBRUARY TALKING ABOUT HOW BLACK PEOPLE INVENTED PEANUT
>> Jon: I THINK RADDIUM WAS A FRENCH LADY.
LOOK, THE REAL ISSUE RIGHT NOW IS HOW CAN IT BE THAT IN THE MIDDLE OF BLACK HISTORY
MONTH AN ASIAN KID COMES IN AND DOES THIS.
>> JEREMY LYNN THE NBA'S NEWEST SUPERSTAR.
>> HIS LEDGE ON OF FANS CALLING THIS LYNN-SANITY.
>> HEY, I GOT ONE, YOU'RE KILLING ME.
THIS IS MORE PAINFUL THAN A LIN GROWN TOE NAIL.
>> Jon: NOW WAIT, YOU'RE UP SET BECAUSE AN ASIAN PERSON,
AN ASIAN AMERICAN IS EXCELLING AT A TRADITIONALLY AFRICAN-AMERICAN SPORT.
>> JON, NO, I'M NOT THE ONLY ONE WHO IS NOT HAPPEN.
HE CAN'T EVEN BRING HIMSELF TO PUT ON HIS UNIFORM.
>> JON, I WOULD BE HURT TOO.
HAVE YOUR JOB OUTSOURCED TO ASIA RIGHT IN YOUR FACE.
>> Jon: NO, THEY, THEY DON'T EVEN PLAY THE SAME POSITION.
AND JEREMY LIN HAS HAD TO OVERCOME A GREAT DEAL TO GET WHERE HE IS.
I THOUGHT AS AN AFRICAN-AMERICAN, THAT YOU OF ALL PEOPLE COULD APPRECIATE THAT.
>> NO, JON, DON'T REDUCE THIS TO A DISCUSSION ABOUT MY RACE.
AND YOU KNOW, OKAY, HE'S HAD SOME STRUGGLES.
>> I GET IT, I GET IT LOOK,
CLEARLY THE BASKETBALL IS JUST AN ATTEMPT TO WIN BACK THE LOVE OF HIS TIGER MOM,
>> Jon: I CANNOT EVEN BELIEVE, WHAT HAS GOTTEN INTO YOU.
>> JON, IT IS JUST ANOTHER THING THAT GOT TAKEN FROM US,
>> Jon: NOTHING IS BEING TAKEN, LARRY.
>> I FEEL LIKE I'M STILL LIVING A DREAM.
I FEEL LIKE I'M IN A DREAM RIGHT NOW.
>> Jon: WAIT FOR IT, WAIT FOR IT.
SLOW DOWN MARTIN LUTHER KUNG POW.
AFRICAN-AMERICANS HAVE BEEN DOING VERY, VERY WELL,
>> YEAH, ASIAN SIDE LIKES GOLF, HIS BLACK SIDE LIKES TRASHY WHITE GIRLS.
>> Jon: LARRY, IT'S NOT LIKE BLACK PLAYERS ARE GOING TO DISAPPEAR BECAUSE AN ASIAN
>> WELL, REALLY, THEN TELL ME THIS, JON, WHO WAS THE FIRST PRO BASKETBALL PLAYERS?
>> IMMIGRANT JEWS DOMINATED THE FIRST PRO BASKETBALL LEAGUE, THE CLEVELAND ROSENBLOOMS.
LOOK, THEY EVEN HAD THEIR OWN UNIFORMS.
YOU KNOW WHAT IS SURPASS BEING THAT PICTURE, GYMS ARE VERY DRAFTY AND YOU WOULD
HAVE THINK THEY WHAT HAVE HAD LONGER SLEEVES BECAUSE JEWS TRADITIONALLY VERY PRONE TO COLDS.
JEWISH BASKETBALL PLAYERS WERE REPLACED BY GENTILES THEN US AND UNLESS WE DO
SOMETHING QUICK, NOW IT'S GOING TO BE ASIANS.
>> Jon: BUT WHAT CAN YOU DO.
>> JON, DON'T WORRY, I MAY HAVE A SOLUTION.
PRETTY SURE THIS WHOLE ASIAN BASKETBALL INVASION MIGHT BE REVENGE FOR A KNEEL DEGRASS TYSON.
BUT, I HAVE CONFERED WITH THE BLACK COMMUNITY AND WE'RE OFFICIALLY ASKING
DON'T WORRY, JON, HE'LL BE FINE.
WE'LL PUT HIM IN A SITCOM,
MAKE HIM A FUNNY, YEAH, MAKE HIM A FUNNY DAD ON BET.
HE'LL MAKE 40 TIMES THE MONEY, I'M TELLING YOU.
JUST GIVE US BACK THE ROCK.
